item.title: Family Net Worth Drops to Level of Early ’90s, Fed Says
item.description: You've probably noticed that American families are struggling. New Fed data provides the stark details: http://t.co/yEoROs3a
item.content:encoded: You've probably noticed that American families are struggling. New Fed data provides the stark details: http://t.co/yEoROs3a The recent financial crisis left the median American family in 2010 with no more wealth than they had in the early 1990s, erasing almost two decades of accumulated prosperity, the Federal Reserve said. Link - Trackbacks
